title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.11 - Petroleum gas systems
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.11 - Petroleum gas systems

State Regulations
(a) Each plant
that supplies petroleum gas by pipeline to a natural gas distribution system
must meet the requirements of this Part and NFPA 58 and NFPA 59 (as described
in section
10.3
of this Title). (b) Each pipeline system subject to this Part
that transports only petroleum gas or petroleum gas/air mixtures must meet the
requirements of NFPA 58 and 59 (as described in section
10.3
of this Title). (c) If the event of a conflict between this

Part and NFPA 58 and NFPA 59, NFPA 58 and NFPA 59 prevails. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
